snippet: Mark Kantrowitz, an expert on paying for college and the founder of FinAid.org, is answering reader questions about financial aid applications this week.
abstract: Mark Kantrowitz, an expert on paying for college and the founder of FinAid.org, is answering reader questions about financial aid applications this week.
lead_paragraph: 10:26 a.m. | Updated We are no longer accepting questions for this feature.

headline.main: Part 1: Answers on the Fafsa, the Free Application for Federal Student Aid
